channel.title: CVE Feed for Avdor CIS -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-36780|2024-08-03T10:14:28.327Z -- avdor%20cis -- crystal%20quality
item.description: Avdor CIS - crystal quality Credentials Management Errors. The product is phone call recorder, you can hear all the recorded calls without authenticate to the system. Attacker sends crafted URL to the system: ip:port//V=2;ChannellD=number;Ext=number;Command=startLM;Client=number;Request=number;R=number number - id of the recorded number.
